content: **from the pattern** this adorable stuffed bear is knitted in furry nanuk giving it irresistible texture pattern is also available in different yarn barrison 2 0 /patterns/library/barrison-20 back and front are worked bottom-up as one piece each then sewn together and stuffed instructions are written **skill level** intermediate **finished measurements** approximately 12 high **materials** 2 balls berroco nanuk 50 grs/70 yards #5403 narwhal straight knitting needles size 10½ 6 50 mm or size to obtain gauge 1 st holder polyester stuffing sewing needle and embroidery thread **gauge** 12 sts = 4 18 row = 4 in st st
